properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT FREE_BOARD_NO , CATEGORY , BOARD_TITLE , USER_NAME , BOARD_VIEWS , CREATED_DATE FROM FREE_BOARD F JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_NO = F.USER_NO) WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
